title: Embedding of permutation signs into a ring

blocks.name: zrhpsgnmhm
blocks.content: Embedding of permutation signs into an arbitrary ring is a homomorphism. (Contributed by SO, 9-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm zrhpsgnmhm(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(ccom(cfv(czrh, c0), cfv(cpsgn, c1)), co(cfv(csymg, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c0))))
} = {
  syl2an(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(ccom(cfv(czrh, c0), cfv(cpsgn, c1)), co(cfv(csymg, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c0))), wcel(cfv(czrh, c0), co(cfv(cmgp, zring), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c0))), wcel(cfv(cpsgn, c1), co(cfv(csymg, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, zring))))
  syl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(czrh, c0), co(cfv(cmgp, zring), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c0))), wcel(cfv(czrh, c0), co(zring, crh, c0)))
  zrhrhm(c0, cfv(czrh, c0))
  eqid(cfv(czrh, c0))
  rhmmhm(cfv(czrh, c0), zring, c0, cfv(cmgp, zring), cfv(cmgp, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, zring))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  sylancl(wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(cfv(cpsgn, c1), co(cfv(csymg, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, zring))), wcel(cfv(cpsgn, c1), co(cfv(csymg, c1), cmhm, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))), wcel(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, zring))))
  syl(wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(cfv(cpsgn, c1), co(cfv(csymg, c1), cmhm, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))), wcel(cfv(cpsgn, c1), co(cfv(csymg, c1), cghm, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))))
  psgnghm2(c1, cfv(cpsgn, c1), cfv(csymg, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))
  eqid(cfv(csymg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cpsgn, c1))
  eqid(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))
  ghmmhm(cfv(cpsgn, c1), cfv(csymg, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))
  mpbir2an(wcel(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, zring))), wcel(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))), wss(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cz))
  simpli(wcel(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))), wss(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  mpbi(wa(wcel(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))), wss(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))), wcel(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(csubmnd, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))))
  ax-mp(wcel(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(csubmnd, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))), wcel(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(csubg, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))))
  cnmsgnsubg(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  subgsubm(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  mp2b(wb(wcel(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(csubmnd, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))), wa(wcel(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))), wss(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))), wcel(ccnfld, crg), wcel(cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))))
  cnring()
  unitsubm(ccnfld, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  drngui(cc, nat0, ccnfld)
  cnfldbas()
  cnfld0()
  cndrng()
  subsubm(cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  eqid(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  mp2b(wb(wcel(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, zring))), wa(wcel(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))), wss(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cz))), wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(cz, cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))))
  zsubrg()
  subrgsubm(cz, ccnfld, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  subsubm(cz, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(cmgp, zring))
  eqcomi(cfv(cmgp, zring), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cz))
  resmhm2(cfv(cpsgn, c1), cfv(csymg, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(cmgp, zring))
  eqtr3i(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), co(cfv(cmgp, zring), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), co(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cz), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))
  mp2an(wceq(co(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cz), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)))), wcel(cz, universe), wss(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cz))
  zex()
  mp2an(wss(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cz), wcel(nat1, cz), wcel(cneg(nat1), cz))
  1z()
  neg1z()
  prssi(nat1, cz, cneg(nat1))
  ressabs(cz, universe, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  oveq1i(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cz), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(cmgp, zring))
  zringmpg()
  mhmco(cfv(czrh, c0), cfv(cmgp, zring), cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cpsgn, c1), cfv(csymg, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zrhpsgnmhm(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Fin)‚Üí((ZRHom ` c0)‚àò(pmSgn ` c1))‚àà((SymGrp ` c1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c0)))
} = {
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà Fin, ((ZRHom ` c0)‚àò(pmSgn ` c1))‚àà((SymGrp ` c1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c0)), (ZRHom ` c0)‚àà((mulGrp ` ZZring)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c0)), (pmSgn ` c1)‚àà((SymGrp ` c1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` ZZring)))
  syl(c0 ‚àà Ring, (ZRHom ` c0)‚àà((mulGrp ` ZZring)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c0)), (ZRHom ` c0)‚àà(ZZring[RingHom]c0))
  zrhrhm(c0, (ZRHom ` c0))
  eqid((ZRHom ` c0))
  rhmmhm((ZRHom ` c0), zring, c0, (mulGrp ` ZZring), (mulGrp ` c0))
  eqid((mulGrp ` ZZring))
  eqid((mulGrp ` c0))
  sylancl(c1 ‚àà Fin, (pmSgn ` c1)‚àà((SymGrp ` c1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` ZZring)), (pmSgn ` c1)‚àà((SymGrp ` c1)[MndHom]((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})), { 1, -u(1)} ‚àà(SubMnd `(mulGrp ` ZZring)))
  syl(c1 ‚àà Fin, (pmSgn ` c1)‚àà((SymGrp ` c1)[MndHom]((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})), (pmSgn ` c1)‚àà((SymGrp ` c1)[GrpHom]((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})))
  psgnghm2(c1, (pmSgn ` c1), (SymGrp ` c1), ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))
  eqid((SymGrp ` c1))
  eqid((pmSgn ` c1))
  eqid(((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))
  ghmmhm((pmSgn ` c1), (SymGrp ` c1), ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))
  mpbir2an({ 1, -u(1)} ‚àà(SubMnd `(mulGrp ` ZZring)), { 1, -u(1)} ‚àà(SubMnd `(mulGrp ` CCfld)), { 1, -u(1)} ‚äÜ ‚Ñ§)
  simpli({ 1, -u(1)} ‚àà(SubMnd `(mulGrp ` CCfld)), { 1, -u(1)} ‚äÜ(‚ÑÇ \ { 0 }))
  mpbi(({ 1, -u(1)} ‚àà(SubMnd `(mulGrp ` CCfld))‚àß { 1, -u(1)} ‚äÜ(‚ÑÇ \ { 0 })), { 1, -u(1)} ‚àà(SubMnd `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](‚ÑÇ \ { 0 }))))
  ax-mp({ 1, -u(1)} ‚àà(SubMnd `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](‚ÑÇ \ { 0 }))), { 1, -u(1)} ‚àà(SubGrp `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](‚ÑÇ \ { 0 }))))
  cnmsgnsubg(((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](‚ÑÇ \ { 0 })))
  subgsubm({ 1, -u(1)}, ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](‚ÑÇ \ { 0 })))
  mp2b(({ 1, -u(1)} ‚àà(SubMnd `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](‚ÑÇ \ { 0 })))‚Üî({ 1, -u(1)} ‚àà(SubMnd `(mulGrp ` CCfld))‚àß { 1, -u(1)} ‚äÜ(‚ÑÇ \ { 0 }))), CCfld ‚àà Ring, (‚ÑÇ \ { 0 })‚àà(SubMnd `(mulGrp ` CCfld)))
  cnring()
  unitsubm(ccnfld, (‚ÑÇ \ { 0 }), (mulGrp ` CCfld))
  drngui(cc, nat0, ccnfld)
  cnfldbas()
  cnfld0()
  cndrng()
  subsubm((‚ÑÇ \ { 0 }), (mulGrp ` CCfld), { 1, -u(1)}, ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](‚ÑÇ \ { 0 })))
  eqid(((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](‚ÑÇ \ { 0 })))
  mp2b(({ 1, -u(1)} ‚àà(SubMnd `(mulGrp ` ZZring))‚Üî({ 1, -u(1)} ‚àà(SubMnd `(mulGrp ` CCfld))‚àß { 1, -u(1)} ‚äÜ ‚Ñ§)), ‚Ñ§ ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld), ‚Ñ§ ‚àà(SubMnd `(mulGrp ` CCfld)))
  zsubrg()
  subrgsubm(cz, ccnfld, (mulGrp ` CCfld))
  eqid((mulGrp ` CCfld))
  subsubm(cz, (mulGrp ` CCfld), { 1, -u(1)}, (mulGrp ` ZZring))
  eqcomi((mulGrp ` ZZring), ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]‚Ñ§))
  resmhm2((pmSgn ` c1), (SymGrp ` c1), ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}), { 1, -u(1)}, (mulGrp ` ZZring))
  eqtr3i(((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}), ((mulGrp ` ZZring)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}), (((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]‚Ñ§)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))
  mp2an((((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]‚Ñ§)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})=((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}), ‚Ñ§ ‚àà ùïå, { 1, -u(1)} ‚äÜ ‚Ñ§)
  zex()
  mp2an({ 1, -u(1)} ‚äÜ ‚Ñ§, 1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, -u(1)‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  1z()
  neg1z()
  prssi(nat1, cz, -u(1))
  ressabs(cz, universe, { 1, -u(1)}, (mulGrp ` CCfld))
  oveq1i(((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]‚Ñ§), cress, { 1, -u(1)}, (mulGrp ` ZZring))
  zringmpg()
  mhmco((ZRHom ` c0), (mulGrp ` ZZring), (mulGrp ` c0), (pmSgn ` c1), (SymGrp ` c1))
}

blocks.name: zrhpsgninv
blocks.content: The embedded sign of a permutation equals the embedded sign of the inverse of the permutation. (Contributed by SO, 9-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm zrhpsgninv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c4, c5), ccnv(c2)), cfv(ccom(c4, c5), c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, c1)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(czrh, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpsgn, c1))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c4, c5), ccnv(c2)), cfv(ccom(c4, c5), c2))), wceq(c4, cfv(czrh, c0)))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(ccom(c4, c5), ccnv(c2)), cfv(ccom(c4, c5), c2), cfv(c4, cfv(c5, ccnv(c2))), cfv(c4, cfv(c5, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3)))
  fveq2d(c4, cfv(c5, ccnv(c2)), cfv(c5, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(c5, ccnv(c2)), cfv(c5, c2)))
  psgninv(c1, c2, c3, c5, cfv(csymg, c1))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c4, c5), ccnv(c2)), cfv(c4, cfv(c5, ccnv(c2)))), wf(c5, c3, cfv(cbs, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))), wcel(ccnv(c2), c3))
  eqeltrrd(ccnv(c2), c3, cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csymg, c1)), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3)))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csymg, c1)), c2), ccnv(c2)))
  symginv(c2, c3, cfv(cminusg, cfv(csymg, c1)), cfv(csymg, c1), c1)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csymg, c1)), c2), c3), wcel(cfv(csymg, c1), cgrp), wcel(c2, c3))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cfv(csymg, c1), cgrp))
  symggrp(c1, cfn, cfv(csymg, c1))
  grpinvcl(cfv(csymg, c1), c2, c3, cfv(cminusg, cfv(csymg, c1)))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csymg, c1)))
  fvco3(c5, c3, cfv(cbs, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)))), ccnv(c2), c4)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c4, c5), c2), cfv(c4, cfv(c5, c2))), wf(c5, c3, cfv(cbs, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))), wcel(c2, c3))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3), wf(c5, c3, cfv(cbs, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))))
  syl(wcel(c1, cfn), wf(c5, c3, cfv(cbs, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))), wcel(c5, co(cfv(csymg, c1), cghm, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))))
  psgnghm2(c1, c5, cfv(csymg, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))
  eqid(cfv(csymg, c1))
  eqid(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))
  ghmf(c5, cfv(csymg, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), c3, cfv(cbs, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)))))
  simp3(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, c3))
  fvco3(c5, c3, cfv(cbs, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)))), c2, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zrhpsgninv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí((c4 ‚àò c5)` `' c2)=((c4 ‚àò c5)` c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base `(SymGrp ` c1))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(ZRHom ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(pmSgn ` c1)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí((c4 ‚àò c5)` `' c2)=((c4 ‚àò c5)` c2)), c4 =(ZRHom ` c0))
  3eqtr4d(((c4 ‚àò c5)` `' c2), ((c4 ‚àò c5)` c2), (c4 `(c5 ` `' c2)), (c4 `(c5 ` c2)), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  fveq2d(c4, (c5 ` `' c2), (c5 ` c2), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà Fin, c2 ‚àà c3, (c5 ` `' c2)=(c5 ` c2))
  psgninv(c1, c2, c3, c5, (SymGrp ` c1))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), ((c4 ‚àò c5)` `' c2)=(c4 `(c5 ` `' c2)), (c5 : c3 ‚Üí(Base `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))), `' c2 ‚àà c3)
  eqeltrrd(`' c2, c3, ((invg `(SymGrp ` c1))` c2), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà Fin, c2 ‚àà c3, ((invg `(SymGrp ` c1))` c2)= `' c2)
  symginv(c2, c3, (invg `(SymGrp ` c1)), (SymGrp ` c1), c1)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), ((invg `(SymGrp ` c1))` c2)‚àà c3, (SymGrp ` c1)‚àà Grp, c2 ‚àà c3)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà Fin, c2 ‚àà c3, (SymGrp ` c1)‚àà Grp)
  symggrp(c1, cfn, (SymGrp ` c1))
  grpinvcl((SymGrp ` c1), c2, c3, (invg `(SymGrp ` c1)))
  eqid((invg `(SymGrp ` c1)))
  fvco3(c5, c3, (Base `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})), `' c2, c4)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), ((c4 ‚àò c5)` c2)=(c4 `(c5 ` c2)), (c5 : c3 ‚Üí(Base `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))), c2 ‚àà c3)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà Fin, c2 ‚àà c3, (c5 : c3 ‚Üí(Base `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))))
  syl(c1 ‚àà Fin, (c5 : c3 ‚Üí(Base `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))), c5 ‚àà((SymGrp ` c1)[GrpHom]((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})))
  psgnghm2(c1, c5, (SymGrp ` c1), ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))
  eqid((SymGrp ` c1))
  eqid(((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))
  ghmf(c5, (SymGrp ` c1), ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}), c3, (Base `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})))
  eqid((Base `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})))
  simp3(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà Fin, c2 ‚àà c3)
  fvco3(c5, c3, (Base `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})), c2, c4)
}

blocks.name: evpmss
blocks.content: Even permutations are permutations. (Contributed by SO, 9-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm evpmss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wss(cfv(cevpm, c0), c1)
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csymg, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
} = {

thm psgnodpm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

blocks.name: zrhcopsgnelbas
blocks.content: Embedding of permutation signs into a ring results in an element of the ring. (Contributed by AV, 1-Jan-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 3-Jul-2022.)

blocks.name: evpmodpmf1o
blocks.content: The function for performing an even permutation after a fixed odd permutation is one to one onto all odd permutations. (Contributed by SO, 9-Jul-2018.)

blocks.name: pmtrodpm
blocks.content: A transposition is an odd permutation. (Contributed by SO, 9-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmtrodpm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, cdif(c3, cfv(cevpm, c0))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csymg, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)))
} = {
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, cdif(c3, cfv(cevpm, c0))), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpsgn, c0), c1), cneg(nat1)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c3))
  sseli(c1, c2, c3)
  symgtrf(c2, c3, c0, c4)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpsgn, c0), c1), cneg(nat1)))
  psgnpmtr(c1, c2, cfv(cpsgn, c0), c4, c0)
  psgnodpmr(c0, c1, c3, cfv(cpsgn, c0), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cpsgn, c0))
}

blocks.name: psgnfix1
blocks.content: A permutation of a finite set fixing one element is generated by transpositions not involving the fixed element. (Contributed by AV, 13-Jan-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm psgnfix1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0)), wi(wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1))), wrex(s1, cword(c4), wceq(cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), co(c5, cgsu, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, c0)))
  -| wceq(c4, crn(cfv(cpmtr, cdif(c0, csn(c1)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csymg, cdif(c0, csn(c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1))), wrex(s1, cword(c4), wceq(cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), co(c5, cgsu, cv(s1)))))
  mpbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1)))), wrex(s1, cword(c4), wceq(cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), co(c5, cgsu, cv(s1)))), wcel(cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(cbs, c5)))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1))), wcel(cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(cbs, c5)))
  symgfixelsi(s0, c1, c0, c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1)), cdif(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(cbs, c5), c3)

  fveq2i(cbs, c5, cfv(csymg, cdif(c0, csn(c1))))

  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1)))), wb(wcel(cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(cbs, c5)), wrex(s1, cword(c4), wceq(cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), co(c5, cgsu, cv(s1))))), wcel(cdif(c0, csn(c1)), cfn))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1))), wcel(cdif(c0, csn(c1)), cfn))
  diffi(c0, csn(c1))
  psgnfitr(s1, cdif(c0, csn(c1)), cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(cbs, c5), c4, c5)

}

blocks.name: psgndif
blocks.content: Embedding of permutation signs restricted to a set without a single element into a ring. (Contributed by AV, 31-Jan-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm psgndif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0)), wi(wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1))), wceq(cfv(c4, cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1)))), cfv(c5, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, c0)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpsgn, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpsgn, cdif(c0, csn(c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

blocks.name: copsgndif
blocks.content: Embedding of permutation signs restricted to a set without a single element into a ring. (Contributed by AV, 31-Jan-2019.) (Revised by AV, 5-Jul-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm copsgndif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0)), wi(wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1))), wceq(cfv(ccom(c4, c5), cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1)))), cfv(ccom(c4, c6), c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, c0)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cpsgn, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpsgn, cdif(c0, csn(c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1))), wceq(cfv(ccom(c4, c5), cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1)))), cfv(ccom(c4, c6), c2)))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(ccom(c4, c5), cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1)))), cfv(ccom(c4, c6), c2), cfv(c4, cfv(c5, cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1))))), cfv(c4, cfv(c6, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1)))))
  fveq2d(c4, cfv(c5, cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1)))), cfv(c6, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1)))))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1))), wceq(cfv(c5, cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1)))), cfv(c6, c2)))
  psgndif(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1)))), wceq(cfv(ccom(c4, c5), cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1)))), cfv(c4, cfv(c5, cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1)))))), wcel(cdif(c0, csn(c1)), cfn), wcel(cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c0, csn(c1))))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1))), wcel(cdif(c0, csn(c1)), cfn))
  diffi(c0, csn(c1))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1))), wcel(cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c0, csn(c1))))))
  symgfixelsi(s0, c1, c0, c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1)), cdif(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c0, csn(c1)))), c3)
  eqid(crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1)))
  eqid(cdif(c0, csn(c1)))
  cofipsgn(cdif(c0, csn(c1)), cres(c2, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c0, csn(c1)))), c4, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c0, csn(c1)))))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1))), wceq(cfv(ccom(c4, c6), c2), cfv(c4, cfv(c6, c2))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1))), wceq(cfv(ccom(c4, c6), c2), cfv(c4, cfv(c6, c2))), wcel(c2, c3))
  elrabi(s0, c2, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c1))
  cofipsgn(c0, c2, c3, c4, c6)
}

thm copsgndif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c1)= c1 } ‚Üí((c4 ‚àò c5)`(c2 |`(c0 \ { c1 })))=((c4 ‚àò c6)` c2)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base `(SymGrp ` c0))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(pmSgn ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(pmSgn `(c0 \ { c1 }))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  ex((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c1)= c1 }, ((c4 ‚àò c5)`(c2 |`(c0 \ { c1 })))=((c4 ‚àò c6)` c2))
  3eqtr4d(((c4 ‚àò c5)`(c2 |`(c0 \ { c1 }))), ((c4 ‚àò c6)` c2), (c4 `(c5 `(c2 |`(c0 \ { c1 })))), (c4 `(c6 ` c2)), ((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0)‚àß c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c1)= c1 }))
  fveq2d(c4, (c5 `(c2 |`(c0 \ { c1 }))), (c6 ` c2), ((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0)‚àß c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c1)= c1 }))
  imp((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c1)= c1 }, (c5 `(c2 |`(c0 \ { c1 })))=(c6 ` c2))
  psgndif(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6)
  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà Fin ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0)‚àß c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c1)= c1 }), ((c4 ‚àò c5)`(c2 |`(c0 \ { c1 })))=(c4 `(c5 `(c2 |`(c0 \ { c1 })))), (c0 \ { c1 })‚àà Fin, (c2 |`(c0 \ { c1 }))‚àà(Base `(SymGrp `(c0 \ { c1 }))))
  ad2antrr(c0 ‚àà Fin, c1 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c1)= c1 }, (c0 \ { c1 })‚àà Fin)
  diffi(c0, { c1 })
  adantll(c0 ‚àà Fin, c1 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c1)= c1 }, (c2 |`(c0 \ { c1 }))‚àà(Base `(SymGrp `(c0 \ { c1 }))))
  symgfixelsi(s0, c1, c0, c2, { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c1)= c1 }, (c0 \ { c1 }), (Base `(SymGrp `(c0 \ { c1 }))), c3)
  eqid({ s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c1)= c1 })
  eqid((c0 \ { c1 }))
  cofipsgn((c0 \ { c1 }), (c2 |`(c0 \ { c1 })), (Base `(SymGrp `(c0 \ { c1 }))), c4, c5)
  eqid((Base `(SymGrp `(c0 \ { c1 }))))
  adantlr(c0 ‚àà Fin, c1 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c1)= c1 }, ((c4 ‚àò c6)` c2)=(c4 `(c6 ` c2)))
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà Fin, c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c1)= c1 }, ((c4 ‚àò c6)` c2)=(c4 `(c6 ` c2)), c2 ‚àà c3)
  elrabi(s0, c2, c3, (s0 ` c1)= c1)
  cofipsgn(c0, c2, c3, c4, c6)
}
